about_the_game:
Resident Fear: Redistribution

"Resident Fear: Redistribution" is a spine-tingling horror game from Gamesoft Studios that puts you in the middle of a zombie apocalypse. Your goal is simple: survive, explore eerie places, solve tricky puzzles, and face terrifying zombies.

But there's a deeper story here. The city's fallen into chaos because of a sinister corporation with dark secrets. Your choices shape your fate and the city's future. Will you escape the horrors, or will darkness take over?

This game offers suspense, exploration, and strategy. Can you find the courage to face your fears and win? The city's fate is in your hands. Are you ready for the ultimate test?

Key Features :


  • Thrilling horror gameplay
  • Mysterious locations and challenging puzzles
  • Scary zombies and an exciting story
  • Discover hidden corporate secrets
  • Your choices impact the story
  • An adventure that keeps you on the edge of your seat

"Resident Fear: Redistribution" is a survival challenge. Stay tuned for updates, and exclusive sneak peeks. Follow Gamesoft Studios for exciting news about this chilling adventure! Get ready to confront your darkest fears.

content_descriptors.notes:
In our game, "Resident Fear: Redistribution," we want to provide you with a transparent understanding of the mature content that you can expect to encounter. While we strive to create an immersive and engaging gaming experience, we also recognize the importance of informing our players about potentially sensitive themes.

The mature content in our game includes intense scenes of violence, gore, and horror. Players will be exposed to challenging situations where they will need to confront terrifying undead creatures and navigate through unsettling environments. Additionally, the storyline may touch upon themes of survival in a post-apocalyptic setting.

It's important to note that our game does not depict sexual acts, explicit sexual content, or any form of sexual assault/non-consensual sex. We have consciously avoided including such content to ensure a respectful and enjoyable experience for all players.

We believe that by providing you with this overview, we're helping you make an informed decision about playing "Resident Fear: Redistribution." If you have any specific concerns or questions about the mature content in our game, please feel free to reach out to us. Your comfort and enjoyment are our top priorities, and we want you to have a memorable and engaging experience while playing our game.

name: Resident Fear : Redistribution

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: i3 3240
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GT730 2GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
  • VR Support: No
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: windows 10 , 11
  • Processor: i5 2600 and above
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1080 4GB
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
  • VR Support: No

short_description: "Survive a zombie nightmare in 'Resident Fear: Redistribution.' Explore, solve puzzles, and confront the undead in this thrilling horror adventure from Gamesoft Studios."
